survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Remote Work Technology Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and usability of remote work technologies provided by the company.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the remote work technology tools provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better data granularity. Ensure the scale is balanced and neutral.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the remote work technology tools provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following remote work tools do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to capture tool usage accurately. Include an 'Other' option for unforeseen tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following remote work tools do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using remote work technology?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using remote work technology?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with remote work tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure issue occurrence. Ensure the options cover a broad range.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with remote work tools?

questions.question_text: What additional technology support or tools would improve your remote work experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture unmet needs. Encourage specific suggestions.
